# status

**Instance Property**

The status of the player item.

## Declaration

```swift
var status: WKAudioFilePlayerItemStatus { get }
```

## Discussion

When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKAudioFilePlayerItemStatus/failed], the [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKAudioFilePlayerItem/error] property contains the reason for the failure.

## Getting Information About the Item

- **asset**: The audio file asset being managed.
- **error**: An error that describes the cause of a failure.
